name: Dicey escape from hell
description:
Our professional gambler started to feel pretty bonely in hell. Can you help him escape hell? He would love to roll some dices with someone again.

'Dicey escape from hell' is a 2D Platformer for PC, featuring a man who has sinned and whose movements are limited because of that. The dice will decide the strength of your abilties.

Made for the GMTK JAM 2022

Credits
Art/Animation: Arturo Alexander Pajuelo

Programming: Albert Millas Roura

Design: Lara Rogonja
